titles.title: A resolution designating August 2008 as "National Truancy Prevention Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 924.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 8/1/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates August 2008 as National Truancy Prevention Month.Encourages law enforcement, school officials, the judiciary, community leaders, and the business community to work together to address truancy.
